title: Recovering  the sacred part 2: sacredness and suffering w/ Jordan Hall - Voices with Vervaeke
description: Jordan and I return to  the discussion of the sacred and explore its relationship to suffering loss and experiencing grief.  This was a very challenging dia logos, but very rewarding nevertheless.
